alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 4:29AM CDT until June 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Raccoon River at Des Moines Fleur Dr affecting Polk County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Raccoon River at Des Moines Fleur Dr. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.3 feet, George Flagg Parkway is closed from Park Avenue to Southwest 30th Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 11.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon to 12.3 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 05/21/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
